name: 陳昱圻　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective:
This course aims to provide practical training on network security tools, such as network packet sniffer, network audit log analysis, etc. Operations on Cyber Defense Exercises (CDX) platform for practical attack/defense exercises are trained in classes. Students can better understand the real application scenarios on information security techniques. Course contents including:
●Cryptographic techniques
●TCP/IP protocols
●Packet sniffer
●Network audit log analysis
●CDX cloud security attack/defense platform
●Web security: SQL injection, XSS attack, etc.
●Penetration test
●Intrusion detection: snort tools
schedule:
1. Cryptography (2 weeks)
2. Network security (4 weeks)
3. Web security (4 weeks)
4. Penetration test (5 weeks)
5. Project presentation (3 weeks)
materials: Ref. book: Cryptography and Network Security: Principles and Practice, Pearson Education Limited
